Steps.Description: Identify all instances of 'Console.WriteLine' in the DataStore, Jobs, Services, and Utilities folders.
Create or ensure a Logger class exists with methods capable of handling various log levels (e.g., Info, Error, Warning).
Replace instances of 'Console.WriteLine' in the CompanyDataStore.cs and GameDataStore.cs files with appropriate logging methods (e.g., logger.Info, logger.Error).

Replace instances of 'Console.WriteLine' in JobRunner.cs, ResearchCompanyJob.cs, TestPeriodicJob.cs, UpdateGameDetailsJob.cs, and UpdateGameRankingsJob.cs with appropriate logging methods (e.g., logger.Info, logger.Error).

Replace instances of 'Console.WriteLine' in RepositoryQuerySession.cs, RepositorySummaryProvider.cs, WebBrowsingService.cs, and WebSearchService.cs with appropriate logging methods (e.g., logger.Info, logger.Error).
Replace instances of 'Console.WriteLine' in Abot2WebsiteCrawler.cs, DiffUtils.cs, LoggerFactory.cs, PuppeteerWebsiteCrawler.cs with appropriate logging methods (e.g., logger.Info, logger.Error).
Ensure that the Logger class is properly instantiated or accessible in each class where 'Console.WriteLine' replacements occur.
Test all modified classes to ensure logging behaves as expected and no Console.WriteLine calls remain for operational logs.
